title: Stanley Shakespeare
text: Stanley C. Shakespeare (February 5, 1963 – April 26, 2005) was an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="wide%20receiver">wide receiver</a> who played one season with the <a href="Tampa%20Bay%20Buccaneers">Tampa Bay Buccaneers</a> of the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a>. He played <a href="college%20football">college football</a> at the <a href="University%20of%20Miami">University of Miami</a> and attended <a href="Lake%20Worth%20High%20School">Lake Worth High School</a> in <a href="Lake%20Worth%20Beach%2C%20Florida">Lake Worth Beach, Florida</a>. He was a member of the Buccaneers during the 1987 NFLPA strike. He drowned on April 26, 2005 after being knocked off his boat by a large wave.
